name: Ivory and Cream Silk Catala and Jeweled Bloom Bridal Bouquet w/ Velvet Leaves
description:
This silk fabric bridal bouquet is comprised of hand cut and formed silk fabric flowers of various shades of cream and ivory. Each flower has its own hand placed highlights featuring either rhinestones, crystals or genuine freshwater pearls. Completely handmade and stunning!

Also features soft handmade silk velvet dusty miller leaves.

Measures about 8 1/2 inches (21.59 centimeters) in diameter and 11 inches (28 centimeters) long with a nicely domed head.

Takes many hours to complete this beauty.

Each flower is its own individual piece with a green dupioni silk wrapped stem that can be molded to any direction. This arrangement can be taken apart and arranged differently if desired.

You can order a custom color bridal bouquet created out of assorted silk fabrics for your wedding day that will last as a cherished keepsake for years to come. Please contact me for custom order information and pricing.

***This is a special order and the bouquet ordered may vary slightly from the photo as with any handcrafted piece***

Please allow 6 weeks to ship.

Rush orders available for an additional fee.

name: Lavender Flower Fascinator Bridal Headband with AB Swarovski Light Amethyst Rhinestone Beaded
description:
Beautiful lavender silk chiffon flower wedding hair fascinator. Centered with AB and light amethyst Swarovski crystals. This is one truly fabulous purple wedding headpiece. One of a kind.

Measures about 5 inches in diameter.

Only one available and ready to ship! Comes in a lovely box making it a perfect gift that is easily and safely tucked away to keep as a reminder of a very special day.

All packaged with love from my studio to your home.

name: Ivory, Off White and Cream Silk Catala and Jeweled Bloom Bridal Bouquet
description:
This silk fabric bridal bouquet is comprised of hand cut and formed silk fabric flowers of various shades of cream, off white and ivory. Each flower has its own hand placed highlights featuring either rhinestones, crystals or genuine freshwater pearls. Completely handmade and stunning!

Measures about 9 1/2 inches (about 24 centimeters) in diameter and 11 inches long.

Takes many hours to complete this beauty.

Each flower is its own individual piece with a green dupioni silk wrapped stem that can be molded to any direction. This arrangement can be taken apart and arranged differently if desired.

name: Ivory Pleated Tulle and Rhinestone Bridal Wedding Cuff - Cocktail Cuff
description:
This playful bridal cuff is created out of soft ivory pleated tulle with a stunning and sparkly silver rhinestone center. Adorable and fun. Makes a great little accessory!

Measures about 6 inches long. Soft satin ribbon ties this securely to your wrist.

Only one available and ready to ship! Comes in a lovely box making it a perfect gift that is easily and safely tucked away to keep as a reminder of a very special day.

All packaged with love from my studio to your home.

name: Promise Ivory Silk Chiffon Flower Fascinator Rhinestone Bridal Hairpiece
description:
Hand dyed ivory silk chiffon flower bridal fascinator hair clip centered with a rhinestone button. Soft and beautiful.

Each hand pressed Emici Bridal signature flower is a little different so your bloom may have a slight variance.

These are pressed by hand in an antique French flower press into a signature Emici Bridal bloom.

Flower measures about 4 1/2 inches in diameter (about 11 cm).
❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤
Emici Bridal signature flowers are hand made to the highest standard. Fabrics and hand dyed, treated and pressed in the studio to produce a completely unique and beautiful flower that will last longer than many other silk flowers.

name: Soft Ivory Pleated Cuff with Gold and Freshwater Pearl Beaded Center - Cocktail Cuff
description:
This playful party or bridal cuff is created out of soft ivory pleated tulle with a golden bead and genuine freshwater pearl center. Adorable and fun. Makes a great little accessory!

You have heard of cocktail rings but what about a cocktail cuff?

Measures about 7 inches long.

Only one available and ready to ship! Comes in a lovely box making it a perfect gift that is easily and safely tucked away to keep as a reminder of a very special day.

name: Diana Peony Embroidered Silk Ring Bearer Pillow
description:
Very limited supply on this adored pink peony embroidered silk dupioni. It's heavily embroidered with peonies on a green background. Each of these pillows are unique and once the fabric is gone it's gone. 

Diana is a larger ring pillow that measures almost 13 inches long (about 33 cm) and about 8 inches wide (about 20 cm). Sweetly soft double face velvet ribbons in moss green wait to securely tie on your rings. The center is graced with a large Swarovski crystal button. A very grand pillow indeed.

Hand tufted on the back with a mother of pearl button and also features a satin strap to help the ring bearer carry the pillow.

name: Ivory Silk Chiffon Flower Bridal Hair Clip Fascinator with Rhinestone Gemstone and Pearl
description:
Beautiful ivory silk chiffon bloom bridal fascinator hair clip is centered with rhinestones, genuine freshwater pearls and crystal quartz gemstones. Fabulous ivory floral headpiece.

Measures about 4 inches wide. Attached to a silver metal alligator clip for ease of use.

Comes in a lovely box making it a perfect gift that is easily and safely tucked away to keep as a reminder of a very special day.

Made out of hand dyed and pressed silk chiffon. I use an antique French flower press to create these petals. Each flower is hand assembled.

All packaged with love from my studio to your home.

name: Soft Blush Floral and Feather Bridal Cuff - Cocktail Cuff
description:
This playful party or bridal cuff is created out of soft blush floral components with freshwater pearl centers, a rhinestone and pearl hoop, silk satin velvet leaves, feathers and French vintage ruched silk trim with a green border. Adorable and fun. Makes a great little accessory!

You have heard of cocktail rings but what about a cocktail cuff?

Measures about 7 inches long.

Only one available and ready to ship! Comes in a lovely box making it a perfect gift that is easily and safely tucked away to keep as a reminder of a very special day.

This brand new original design was created exclusively for the All packaged with love from my studio to your home.

name: Black Silk Chiffon Clip Fascinator with Gold Rhinestone Pearl and Gemstone Beading
description:
Gorgeous black silk chiffon flower hair clip. Centered with gold rhinestones, champagne freshwater pearls and genuine crystal quartz gemstones. Fabulous floral clip for a party. Perfect to clip to a hat or your jacket.

Measures about 4 inches across. Attached to a silver metal alligator clip for ease of use.

Only one available and ready to ship! Comes in a lovely box making it a perfect gift that is easily and safely tucked away to keep as a reminder of a very special day.

All packaged with love from my studio to your home.

name: Mabel Blush Flapper Inspired Lace Rhinestone Headband
description:
Mabel is a lady. This flapper inspired headband is created with antique french chantilly lace that props up rhinestone and freshwater pearl arches. Blush ostrich feathers fan out from underneath.

Attached to a hand dyed pink silk satin ribbon.

Measures about 4 inches wide (about 10-11 cm).

Ready to ship!

name: Double Floral Ivory Silk Organza Bridal Hair Comb Fascinator Freshwater Pearl Flowers
description:
Gorgeous soft ivory silk organza double flower bridal hair comb. Each flower is centered with a hand wired creamy ivory genuine freshwater pearl flower center. How lovely!

Attached to a metal hair comb. One of a kind.

Measures about 7 inches long. 

All packaged with love from my studio to your home.

name: Karina Silk Velvet Something Blue
description:
These little silk velvet blooms are made in an antique Parisian flower press. Ivory silk velvet with an ice blue silk satin back for added hidden detail.

Swarovski crystals and light blue freshwater pearls provide the perfect sparkly center. 

Antique French silk ruched trim. All that is left is in this piece.
One of a kind.

This is designed with multi purpose in mind. You can wear this as a cuff or tie it to anywhere you want a little something extra. So adorable!

Flowers measure about 4 inches long (about 10-11 cm) and about 3 inches wide (about 7-8 cm).

Ready to ship!

name: Star Blush Silk Chiffon Flower Fascinator
description:
Fluttery petaled fascinator beauty. Fades from light blush into a slightly deeper shade in the center of hand pressed and dyed silk chiffon.

Finished as a hair clip and centered with a sparkly Swarovski rhinestone center button.

Each of these flowers is unique and completely hand dyed and pressed in an antique French flower press.

Measures about 5 inches in diameter or about 13 cm.

Perfect party or bridal statement necklace. Ready to ship!

Soft black velvet ribbon is used to tie on this statement necklace.

Pink and black luxe satin ribbons finish off the playful twist to this ring pillow.

These little beauties measure 4 1/2 inches long and 4 inches wide.

Makes a beautiful bridal gift or favor. Perfect to tuck in a drawer or under your pillow for a natural lovely scent whenever you want. Gorgeous simply placed on a nightstand too.

name: Elina Antique Chantilly Silk Lace Bow
description:
Can't say enough about how special this lace bow truly is. Antique ivory lace is layered over antique silk net to create this incredibly unique bow. Topped with a Swarovski rhinestone button that adds to the antique feel.

Ribbon is 100% silk grosgrain.

Side story to tell you about this lace. I often show things that I am creating to my mother because she loves to create just as much as I do. When I showed her this lace she began to get teary eyed and said it reminded her of the family. This has never happened before. Of all the things that I have created. Just thought that was special enough to share with you here.

The wonderful thing about this lace bow is how unique it is. When you place this on your head the subtle pattern of the lace is really magnified. It is such a stunning piece.

Antique lace bow measures about 6 inches long (15-16 cm)

Silk grosgrain ribbon is one yard long. 

Model photoshoot credits: Photographer - Samantha Cabrera, Styling - Alisa Lewis, Dress - "Blush" by Sarah Seven from The Dress Theory in Seattle, Make Up - The Make Up Studio, Hair - Camille at Shine.

name: Small Hera Hair Clip
description:
These flowers start out as light ivory silk chiffon fabric that is hand cut and pressed into petals to form the flower.

The centers are beaded with genuine crystal quartz, freshwater pearls and white topaz gemstones along with rhinestones to finish off the sparkle.

Perfectly soft in every way.

Flower measures about 3 inches in diameter or about 7-8 cm. Available as a flower hair clip. 

❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤

name: Gala
description:
Gala is hand dyed light ivory silk pressed into the prettiest large bloom. Flanked by very special silk velvet leaves that are backed in luxurious heavy silk satin for added detail.

Can be worn as a dramatic headband or bridal sash.

Backed onto a supremely fabulous 100% silk grosgrain ribbon.

Gala measures about 9 inches long (about 23 cm) and about 4 3/4 inches tall (about 12 cm) not including the leaves.

Pictured on the fabulous Meme Francesca (the Emici Bridal mannequin) for size reference.

name: Blush Lace Rhinestone Bow and Feather Comb
description:
So head over heels about these blush antique lace bows trimmed in rhinestones with a blush silk chiffon underlay. This metal hair comb is perfect for a wedding or party. 

Measures about 5 inches tall from the tallest tip of the feather to the bottom of the hair comb (about 12-13 cm). Bow itself measures about 3 inches wide (7-8 cm) not including the feathers.

Extremely limited supply on these. Please allow 2 weeks to ship from the studio.

description:
The Jasmine hand dyed ivory French chantilly lace fascinator is romance distilled down to the core of its sweet floral spirit. 

This is a simple shape taken to all new heights in lacy layers.

Swarovski rhinestone glints radiate from the center of these blooms. Available as an alligator clip or hair comb.

Measures about 4 inches in diameter or about 10 cm.

Pictured on the fabulous Meme Francesca (the Emici Bridal mannequin) for size reference.

Measures about 3 3/4 inches at the widest point (about 9 1/2 cm).

name: Levity Blush and Champagne Halo
description:
The one of a kind Levity Halo is comprised of blush silk flowers created out of two silk fabrics along with silk velvet leaves and vintage champagne lace trim.

Look closely and you will see Swarovski rhinestone buttons and beautiful silk chiffon hydrangea.

The Levity Halo is wrapped in silk ribbon to coordinate with the blooms. The champagne silk velvet leaves are backed in ivory silk satin for a couture touch.

Very special. Please don't hesitate to grab this one for yourself. Only one is available.

Pictured on Meme Francesca (the Emici Bridal mannequin) for size reference.

Each flower is its own individual piece with a green dupioni silk wrapped stem that can be molded to any direction. This arrangement can be taken apart and arranged differently if desired.

name: Caroline Ivory Silk Chiffon Ring Bearer Pillow
description:
Ruched ivory silk chiffon graces over the top of this stunning dupioni silk ring bearer pillow. 

Recalling a time of refined luxury this is sure to be an enduring beauty.

Topped with silk satin ribbon and a glittery rhinestone cluster.

Features silk satin ribbons to attach your rings and a silk ribbon across the back to help the ring bearer carry the pillow.

Hand tufted on the solid silk dupioni back with a mother of pearl button.

name: Ivory, Off White and Cream Silk Catala and Peony Bridal Bouquet
description:
This silk fabric bridal bouquet is comprised of hand cut and formed silk satin and dupioni fabric flowers of various shades of cream, off white and ivory. Each flower has its own hand placed highlights featuring glittering silver rhinestones. Completely handmade and stunning!

Measures about 9 1/2 inches (about 24 centimeters) in diameter and 11 inches long.

Takes many hours to complete this beauty.

Each flower is its own individual piece with a green dupioni silk wrapped stem that can be molded to any direction. This arrangement can be taken apart and arranged differently if desired.

You can order a custom color bridal bouquet created out of assorted silk fabrics for your wedding day that will last as a cherished keepsake for years to come. Please contact me for custom order information and pricing.

name: Lena Dupioni Silk and Vintage Ivory Alencon Lace Ring Pillow
description:
The Lena vintage ivory alencon lace, double face satin ribbon and dupioni silk ring bearer pillow. Shown here in ivory but also available with a blush silk base. Completely infused with romance but also has simplicity.

Features thin satin ribbons to attach your rings and a ribbon across the back to help the ring bearer carry the pillow. Also is hand tufted on the back with a vintage mother of pearl button.

Measures about 8 inches wide and 10 inches long or about 20 centimeters by 25 centimeters.

name: New York Bouquet - Silver and Ivory Vintage Accent Bouquet
description:
This bouquet is sold but you can special order a similiar piece by contacting me. This can also be made in other colors as well.

Featured in the inspiration gallery on Grace Ormonde Wedding Style the New York is the 3rd in the City Series, a series of bouquets that are inspired by iconic cities.

New York is full of inspiration but I chose to focus on the architecture for this piece. The fabrics were carefully chosen in a grey tone pallete to pay homage to the large stone and concrete buildings that define Manhattan. The sea of windows that seductively wink back at you throughout the city are represented by the vintage square crystal buttons that you see scattered about the bouquet. Each one plays with the light and will flash rainbows at you if you give them the chance. The vintage faceted crystal balls represent the iconic ball that will drop in Times Square ushering in another year full of promise and intrigue. 

Pleated silk chiffon leaves add strong defined lines and contrast with the gentle curve of the silk fabric flowers.

Each flower is hand cut and formed, looking closely you will see two different dupioni silks and a silver silk satin. Freshwater pearls mingle with the rhinestones. Smooth elements compliment textured ones and the entire ensemble marries together to form the New York Bouquet. 

Each flower has its own hand wrapped silk stem. The collar is a hand pleated silk organza wrapped in satin ribbon and topped with rhinestones and genuine freshwater pearls.

Please contact me to activate this listing if you would like to purchase this beautiful, one of a kind bouquet. Thank you!

name: Love Knot Ring Pillow
description:
The love knot ring pillow is in a world all its own. Simple and different, it is great for a wide range of weddings. Off center silk sash bows come together with a dupioni silk base pillow where the rings tie onto the center of the pillow bringing balance to the design.

Sorry, rings shown are not included.

Available in white or ivory. Shown here in ivory.

Measures about 8 inches square or about 20 centimeters square.

Features thin satin ribbons to attach your rings and a ribbon across the back to help the ring bearer carry the pillow. Hand tufted with a mother of pearl button on the back.

description:

The flower measures about 4 inches in diameter or about 10 centimeters. It is placed on a silk wrapped stem that you can bend to any direction desired. Stem measures about 10 inches long or about 24 1/2 centimeters.

Your flower will have a removeable bow in your choice of white or ivory luxe satin ribbon.
